### Grand Archive Deck: Merlin, Brilliant Vestige ReCollection Deck

1 Merlin, Memorite Vassal
1 Merlin, Amethyst's Glow
1 Merlin, Brilliant Vestige
1 Assassin's Mantle
1 Life Essence Amulet
1 Poisoned Dagger
1 Prismspire Scepter
1 Proto Key Crest
1 Shardforged Blade
1 Tariff Ring
1 Luminous Quartz
# Main Deck
1 Another Beginning
1 Converge Reflections
4 Crystalline Reality
4 Dormouse Informant
4 Find the Lost
4 Gentle Respite
4 Obelith Escort
2 Overlapping Visages
4 Protect Her At All Costs

3 Undeniable Truth
4 Quiet Refraction
3 Seep Into the Mind
4 Shattered Hope

4 Will to Save
